website_summaries.verdict: One of Quest Nutrition's best-selling protein bars that tastes like actual frosted cake. A good choice if you are already a fan or want to try a Quest bar that has earned a loyal customer following.
pros: Birthday Cake bars earn rave reviews from customers
You get 24 bars in this pack
Suitable for a meal replacement when dieting
cons: Some reports of packs arriving with crumbled bars

customer_reviews.title: Wasted 47 dollars
customer_reviews.text: I opened about 5 quest bars and they have this weird pattern. I thought “maybe it’s just an odd frosting pattern, I’m sure it will taste fine” it didn’t.. the bar is clearly expired and it has a very stale taste. I’m so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Pennane

customer_reviews.title: Super tasty
customer_reviews.text: I love these protein bars, they are perfect for when I crave something sweet but don’t want to have anything super high in calories, fat and sugar. You can definitely tell they are sweetened with erythritol (sugar alcohol). I use sugar alternatives all the time so the taste doesn’t bother me but some people might not like it. If that is you I’d go with a chocolate flavored bar. Typically with chocolate you can’t tell as much with vanilla based flavors like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Sweetly satisfying protein bar; treat your sweet tooth without guilt!
customer_reviews.text: I love the Quest Birthday Cake energy bars!!! They easily satisfy my sweet tooth and I love the fact that these bars are not full of sugar or junk as most energy bars on the market these days are. I have liked the flavor of all the Quest energy bars I’ve tried and I’ve bought & tried at least a case of 9-10 different kinds/flavors. I eat them for meal replacement, a snack or as dessert. I know that no matter what flavor Quest bar I choose I’m getting a healthy serving of protein and fiber with very little sugar. That’s important to me.
customer_reviews.author: TV

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely delicious Gluten Free, High protein/low sugar treat!
customer_reviews.text: I have been on a search for a gluten free, high protein, low sugar, low net carb, easily portable snack for my family of celiacs and diabetics. My daughter has textural issues with nuts, so those were not an option. We found these bars in a Dollar General while on vacation. So far we’ve tried the birthday cake, raspberry white chocolate and chocolate chip cookie dough. Birthday cake is our favorite thus far but they are all good! I highly recommend giving them a try! The first thing I did when we got home was hop on here to locate and order some more. Delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Regina TJ

customer_reviews.title: Hard as a rock!
customer_reviews.text: We've been buying birthday cake protein bars for a while from Walmart. We decided to purchase in bulk from Amazon this time. They arrived in good time and were exactly as ordered. The problem is that they are too hard to eat. So much so that we had to stop trying. I checked the freshness date and they are good for another 3 months. We never had this problem from the ones we purchased at Walmart. They were soft and chewy. We love the Quest brand of protein bars and would normally recommend them...but not when ordering online.
customer_reviews.author: W. Benson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome low calorie protein bars.
customer_reviews.text: Ok protein bars are either: too high in calories or taste like sawdust surrounded by some Goo. These are awesome. I gave one to a buddy of mine who does not need or eat protein bars. He wanted a snack. He loved them. I love these too. I bought an extra box for my brother. They are low in calories 200 - and the taste lets you think you ate a candy bar or piece of cake. Well done. Kudos to the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hollins

customer_reviews.title: I’m very upset!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I buy Quest bars all the time on here and never have a problem. I bought the 2 box ones and they are horrible. I can’t hardly bite a piece off. They have a weird taste also so I feel like I just wasted over $40.00 dollars. I opened both boxes and threw the boxes away and wish I had not because I would be sending those back.
customer_reviews.author: K Martin

customer_reviews.title: Very sweet but delicious addition to the already amazing Quest collection.
customer_reviews.text: These can easily replace a sugar filled sweet when the cravings come but provides a protein rich alternative. I usually eat a Quest as per of breakfast on the go and as a pre/post workout every day. This is a regular in my lineup.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Eubanks

customer_reviews.title: Love these bars but they are high dollar
customer_reviews.text: My Mom and I love these as a replacement for a snack they taste great and have much less sugar than most bars out there they really taste good. But a couple dollars a bar adds up when you eat one a day. Especially for two people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very old & stale
customer_reviews.text: Got what i ordered but had an expiration date of a YEAR ago. Still edible, but definitely stale. Disappointed since I buy these on a regular basis from the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Order is fine. I am sick of this flavor. Too much.
customer_reviews.text: I got sick of eating these. Ordering so much was a bad idea. It just tastes so chemical artificial flavoring. The nutrition stats on these are great though.
customer_reviews.author: Bb

customer_reviews.title: Smashed bars & unusual consistency
customer_reviews.text: I love love the Bday Cake flavor. Unfortunately buying this in bulk wasn’t my usual experience with the bars. They must have gotten warm at some point because half the box bar contents were all smashed bars with the white coating uneven and all around weird consistency. Hmmmm?
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced Protein!
customer_reviews.text: You are paying $40 per box!! Think about that. This is a really bad deal. Buy elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Bars were all deformed where they had melted
customer_reviews.text: I love these balls and order them all the time When I opened these boxes all of them are deformed where they had melted. We are still eating them but very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: HonestReviews

customer_reviews.title: Not low carb!
customer_reviews.text: Beware - these bars have 24 grams of carbs!! These are not low carb or keto friendly. I would rather indulge in something else for 24 grams of carbs in a protein bar.
customer_reviews.author: Chanté206

customer_reviews.title: A sweet, low carb, nutritious treat
customer_reviews.text: If you're on a diet and craving sweets, these low-carb bars satisfy your sweet tooth while providing a generous portion of protein and a high fiber content.
customer_reviews.author: judith blair

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: Was very surprised at how good these taste. Makes for a great meal replacement for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Delicious, lots of fiber, lots of protein, not a lot of net carbs. Can I ask for more?
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like plastic
customer_reviews.text: I usually really like quest bars. I wanted to try a new flavor but this one was a bad choice. It smells like plastic and just has an overall terrible taste. I loved the vanilla and chocolate/peanut butter ones. This one was very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: pillowSnob

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: They came in perfect packaging one of my favorite bars out there Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: blanca

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and Waterlogged
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived a week late. The boxes were waterlogged and there was moisture all over the bars. I wanted to return but am unable to due to personal reasons. Very unsatisfying from a good brand.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Broski

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor - lots of protein
customer_reviews.text: Love these bars! Fun flavor and lots of protein. Great pick-me-up snack
customer_reviews.author: Deb Marchesini

customer_reviews.title: Usually good but received a bad box.
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered these in the past but this last box has bad bars. They look like they're past their shelf life or something (coating is discolored) and the flavor is not nearly as good as past boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Tara S.

customer_reviews.title: Curbs appetite
customer_reviews.text: Amazing taste ! Such a treat w no guilt. Really curbs my sugar cravings. Best bar ever !!
customer_reviews.author: robin groner

customer_reviews.title: Great for losing weight
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Great meal replacement. Just wish they were cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Matt L

customer_reviews.title: Yummy, Love these
customer_reviews.text: Love this bar is my fave flavor and this sellers bars are fresh!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aliciabeautyartist

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting Nutrition Bar!!
customer_reviews.text: This is just like eating cake!! This is our favorite of all of the quest bars. Amazing flavor!!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Old bars!
customer_reviews.text: The box I got was so old and the bars were rock rad and chocolate was turning color. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you Know that this product is unelligable to return this item.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Great protein, good flavor and taste
customer_reviews.text: I always eat a protein bar prior to my workout at the gym, I really like this flavor high in protein, and good taste.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Parr

customer_reviews.title: Thoughtfully packed
customer_reviews.text: They took the time to pack it with cooling materials to keep it fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, the best flavor. It’s like eating a dessert, my favorite so far.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Good on the go.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good snack bar. Just filling enough. The taste is good. But, there can be a bit of a chalky consistency.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick Adams

customer_reviews.title: Optimum Birthday Cake
customer_reviews.text: Taste great but some of the bars are a little stale.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: Love these things
customer_reviews.text: Love these things. Great taste and cure my sometimes craving for sweets all while giving me a post ride (bicycle) shot of nutrition. Highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen stadelmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I Love these bars. They taste great and they work well with my Weight Watchers points (4).
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Netotian

customer_reviews.title: Best Alternative to the Assortment of Chocolate Power Bars
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a chocolate person. I prefer vanilla flavor. So I had a difficult time finding a power bar or meal replacement bar that was neither chocolate nor berry or fruit flavored. This one hit the spot. I've tried other Quest flavors: cookies and cream and choc chip cookie dough but those flavors fell flat for me. The birthday cake flavor tastes amazing. The bar works great when you're on the go and need to fuel up but can't stop for lunch. This is my favorite power bar!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Levin

customer_reviews.title: Hesitant to write a review because...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best protein bar ever and my 2nd fav is their Blueberry muffin! I was paying $2.99 at the gas station and $2.89 a bar at the grocery store. Yes, it's seems pricey buying a box of 12 but it is seriously cheaper. I've bought 3 boxes so far. Yeah, I'm addicted. I love that I can satisfy my sweet tooth, feel full and still meet my goals. I'll be buying this for life!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Cochran

customer_reviews.title: The best flavor ever!
customer_reviews.text: Cookies n Cream flavor used to be my all time favorite snack, then along came Birthday Cake. I eat nothing but this when I want to snack on anything. I went from eating bags of chips almost every night to eating 2-3 of these a day, & my appetite is satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: KMac8281

customer_reviews.title: Taste different
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been eating this brands cake flavor on and off for a good year and a half since I went Keto. These ones I bought two cases from here are really grainy and don’t seem to be the same I’m confused
customer_reviews.author: Iva

customer_reviews.title: Best protein bars on the market ,Period
customer_reviews.text: These are now one of my favorite flavour together with the Chocolate Brownie and the Rockie Road I use them since years and they have the best Ingredients I can find untill now in a Protein bar and also with good Taste/Texture I have one neally every day Good Job!
customer_reviews.author: Enrico Innocenti

customer_reviews.title: Life saver for Chemo Patients.
customer_reviews.text: These saved my life while going through breast cancer. The extra protein helped me keep my muscle while not being able to eat. just a few bites an hour and my stomach was much better. Now that I am in remission, I use these to kill that nighttime sweets craving. Always fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Ann

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for bad batches!
customer_reviews.text: I disliked that they looked like they were melted. They don’t have the same freshness as the ones I buy at the store. The coating is melted and where the bars at the store tAste sinful, these taste like straight up old, stale protein bars.
customer_reviews.author: kat morales

customer_reviews.title: Taste great but digestive issues.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the flavor but these bars give me digestive issues. Believe it is the inulin which is known to give people digestive problems.
customer_reviews.author: JimyIrons

customer_reviews.title: Very sweet but keto approved
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to eat occasionally as part of my keto diet. These are very sweet but they definitely help bridge the gap to the next meal
customer_reviews.author: S & P Mistry

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great addition to my diet plan. I eat them regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Resu Eman

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!!!
customer_reviews.text: You won’t be sorry if you purchase some of these birthday cake quest bars. Delicious, just like the cookies n cream. Caution, these will cause quest bar addiction.
customer_reviews.author: Captain

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: These are great bars. I have tried a few of the other flavors Quest makes but these are by far the best
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Chalupa

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: Brownie used to be my favorite, not any more, these are the bomb.
customer_reviews.author: PurpleKB

customer_reviews.title: My brother's favorite
customer_reviews.text: I honestly can't attest to these, but my brother loves them! Easy gift :)
customer_reviews.author: Kelly S

customer_reviews.title: Taste and Texture!!
customer_reviews.text: All of the Quest bars are great. Only bars I eat! Taste and texture are far better than others I have tried!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a sweet treat with no guilt.
customer_reviews.text: I resisted for a long time - just not that crazy about birthday cake I guess. Anyway - love these!
customer_reviews.author: Idahome

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's very good. But I don't love it. I would order again but in a different flavor.
customer_reviews.author: CEW

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I picked them up from the gentleman delivering them and they were melted.
customer_reviews.author: Somewhat Happy Decor

customer_reviews.title: Love this flavor.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love this Quest bar flavor. Nice taste and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Leiah De Vito

customer_reviews.title: Protein in birthday cake?  Surprize!  It is true and just as delicious.
customer_reviews.text: I did not know what to expect but was more than a little bit surprised, bite after bite.
customer_reviews.author: duckndpond

product_meta.title: Quest Nutrition Birthday Cake Protein Bar, High Protein, Low Carb, Gluten Free, Keto Friendly, 12 Count
feature_bullets: EVERY DAY CAN BE YOUR SPECIAL DAY: The Quest Birthday Cake Protein Bar tastes like a slice of birthday cake you can enjoy every day. Celebrate with 21g protein 4g net carbs and less than 1g of sugar per bar.
FIBER IS YOUR FRIEND: Each Quest Birthday Cake Protein Bar has 14g of fiber to provide your body with a more complete macro profile.
SWEET WITHOUT ADDED SUGAR: Enjoy the rewarding taste without worrying about added sugars. The Quest Birthday Cake Protein Bar has no added sugars.
TREATS THAT TRAVEL WITH YOU: Drop a Quest Birthday Cake Protein Bar with you in your backpack, purse, car console, cup holder, gym bag or wherever your adventures take you.
CELEBRATE COMPLETE PROTEINS: Quest Birthday Cake Protein Bars are made with complete, dairy-based proteins to provide your body with 9 essential amino acids.
